text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_line r06_s r07_phr

LMNL.text: She is as in a field a silken tent

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r07_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r07_phr r08_line

LMNL.text: At midday when the sunny summer breeze

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r07_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r07_phr r09_line

LMNL.text: Has dried the dew and all its ropes relent,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r06_s r10_line r11_phr

LMNL.text: So that in guys it gently sways at ease,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r06_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r06_s r12_quatrain r13_line r14_phr

LMNL.text: And its supporting central cedar pole,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r06_s r12_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r06_s r12_quatrain r15_line r16_phr

LMNL.text: That is its pinnacle to heavenward

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r06_s r12_quatrain r16_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r06_s r12_quatrain r16_phr r17_line

LMNL.text: And signifies the sureness of the soul,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r06_s r12_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r06_s r12_quatrain r18_line r19_phr

LMNL.text: Seems to owe naught to any single cord,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r21_quatrain r22_line r23_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r21_quatrain r22_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r21_quatrain r22_line r24_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r21_quatrain r24_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r21_quatrain r24_phr r25_line

LMNL.text: By countless silken ties of love and thought

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r21_quatrain r24_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r21_quatrain r24_phr r26_line

LMNL.text: To every thing on earth the compass round,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r21_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r21_quatrain r27_line r28_phr

LMNL.text: And only by one's going slightly taut

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r28_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r28_phr r29_couplet r30_line

LMNL.text: In the capriciousness of summer air

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r28_phr r29_couplet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r06_s r20_sestet r28_phr r29_couplet r31_line

LMNL.text: Is of the slightest bondage made aware.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
